Description: Internet outage in HQ affecting multiple floors.
Resolution Notes: Rebooted router and restored connectivity. Similar issue last week.

Description: Repeated VPN disconnections across branches.
Resolution Notes: Applied new VPN configuration and restarted VPN server.

Description: Login failures due to LDAP sync issues.
Resolution Notes: LDAP configuration updated. Re-synced with Active Directory.

Description: Production DB crash during ETL process.
Resolution Notes: Restarted DB server, cleared ETL cache. Increased memory allocation.

Description: Recurring VPN connectivity issues since last patch.
Resolution Notes: Patched VPN server and restarted. Ongoing monitoring required.

Description: Application slowness due to high memory usage.
Resolution Notes: Restarted app server. Increased JVM heap size.

Description: Unauthorized login attempts flagged by security.
Resolution Notes: Blocked unauthorized IPs and reset admin credentials.

Description: Emails not syncing with Exchange server.
Resolution Notes: Reconfigured email client and restarted sync service.

Description: Low disk space alerts on storage cluster.
Resolution Notes: Added more storage capacity and cleared old logs.

Description: Server downtime due to missing patch update.
Resolution Notes: Applied missing patch. Scheduled server reboot.

Description: VPN issues for remote employees.
Resolution Notes: Similar VPN disconnection issue as INC0012346.

Description: Frequent network packet loss in branch office.
Resolution Notes: Network packet loss reduced after router reboot.

Description: DB timeout during data extraction process.
Resolution Notes: DB timeout resolved by query optimization.

Description: Multiple unauthorized login attempts detected.
Resolution Notes: Brute force attempts blocked. Similar to INC0012356.

Description: High server CPU usage causing performance issues.
Resolution Notes: CPU usage stabilized with resource scaling.

Description: Network slowdowns during peak hours.
Resolution Notes: Network slowdowns resolved by load balancing.

Description: DB query timeout during batch processing.
Resolution Notes: Query timeouts fixed by DB reindexing.

Description: Application crash post recent deployment.
Resolution Notes: App crash resolved by rolling back the deployment.

Description: Repeated brute force attacks on security endpoints.
Resolution Notes: Blocked new suspicious IPs from brute force.

Description: Intermittent connectivity issues in main office.
Resolution Notes: Connectivity issue resolved by cable replacement.
